overview: 'Do as thou wishest, I am a fylm makker, you a film maker, make what you can from my residues, tis no concern of I'  ...is what Simon Munnery said when we asked him if we could release a recording of his Fylm Makking experiments.  In these shows, Simon never appears on stage. Instead he sits in the audience behind a box of tricks that can display his face, the table or both. From here he contrives to make live films - or Fylms - which are projected on a big screen at the front of the theatre. What you see on the DVD is exactly what the audiences saw on their big screen.
title: Simon Munnery: Fylm Makker
